node.prompt: Good job criminal, you've destroyed that asteroid! Fly over the debris and you'll collect all those lovely minerals. Maybe you'll even get some Ice? Silly humans and their oxygen dependency! Press "I" to open your intentory and have a look at what you pick up!
When you're full up on resources, or running out of air to fuel your meat sack, fly back to the mining station! I'll explain more when you get there, you have fun criminal! F.R.I.E.N.D out!
